anathema: Strive to break the cycle of life (such as by attaining immortality or creating undead), despoil the earth, kill a juvenile creature
area_of_concern_raw: Blood, the cycle of life, fertility, knowledge
edict: Abide by the cycles of life, aid childbirth, destroy undead
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Fandarra (The Blood Mother)](/Deities.aspx?ID=492)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 310

Fandarra (sometimes bearing the title of the Blood Mother, the Earth Mother, or Mother of All) is the giant god of blood, the cycle of life, knowledge, and fertility. Followers claim that all animals, all people, and all deities were born from her. Though most acts of piety in her name are performed by [stone giants](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3012), many other types of giants, and even humans in cold climates like northern Avistan, worship her in some way, shape, or form as well. In largely giant followings, she is portrayed as a bald stone giant woman, her head adorned with a lush crown of leaves and flowers. Draped on her shoulders is a cloak of red fur, usually [mammoth](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2994), [bear](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=370), or [wolf](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=485), and around her neck is a necklace of knives or arrowheads to bear against those who violate the natural cycles of life. When depicted in relation to fertility, she is also shown as pregnant, occasionally carrying an infant giant and bear in either arm. There are many tales of Fandarra in regard to her combat prowess, taking up arms to protect kin and the sanctity of life.

Fandarra’s worshippers value balance and care deeply for family, regardless of if they’re related by blood. Clanmates, friends, and even pets are considered family by followers of Fandarra. Most of her ecclesiastics are [clerics](/Classes.aspx?ID=33) and [druids](/Classes.aspx?ID=34), donning her religious symbol of a crescent moon rising up from behind a mountain.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Giant Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=26)

**Edicts** Abide by the cycles of life, aid childbirth, destroy undead

**Anathema** Strive to break the cycle of life (such as by attaining immortality or creating undead), despoil the earth, kill a juvenile creature

**Area of Concern**
Blood, the cycle of life, fertility, knowledge

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Constitution or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy or unholy

**Divine Skill** [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)

**Favored Weapon** [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=358)

**Domains** [Death](/Domains.aspx?ID=70), [Family](/Domains.aspx?ID=74), [Knowledge](/Domains.aspx?ID=80), [Nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=85)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Earth](/Domains.aspx?ID=73)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Endure](/Spells.aspx?ID=2348)

- **3rd**
[Wall of Thorns](/Spells.aspx?ID=1752)

- **5th**
[Blister](/Spells.aspx?ID=1969)

</column>
name: Fandarra (The Blood Mother)
